DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the relative bioavailability of Flavoxate Hydrochloride tablets 100mg manufactured by Paddock Laboratories, Inc., with that of UrispasÂ® tablets 100mg by SmithKline Beecham Pharmaceuticals under fasting conditions.
DOC.brief_title: A Relative Bioavailability Study of 100 mg Flavoxate Hydrochloride Tablets Under Fasting Conditions
DOC.criteria: Good health as determined by lack of clinically significant abnormalities in health assessment performed at screening Positive test results for HIV or Hepatitis B or C History of allergy or sensitivity to Flavoxate hydrochloride or related drugs
